1.Text: This is an example content file. A simple section like this always shows up.

2.Text: This section only shows up some of the time. Specifically 75% of the time.

3.Text: The section below actually repeats between 1 and 10 times. It also calling a Table Generator to replace the text with content from another generator. Colors in this case. By setting the ParagraphType to List its displayed as an unordered list in html.

5.Text: The shape list below shows up 75% of the time and has 1 to 3 repeats.

7.Text: This entry generates a random number between 1 and 1000 through a special Generator markup:$R-1_1000$.
